name: Dodge Gauntlet
description:
Can you survive the Dodge Gauntlet? Try to survive for 90s on Easy or Hard difficulty by dodging the incoming shredders. As the music progresses so does the difficulty! Inspired by games like The Impossible Game where you try to master something challenging in a quick loop.

This was a fun project just to get something finished enough that anyone can pick up and play. Have fun with this small time waster!
